docs.text: Getting Started Go Package to get information regarding the novel corona virus provided by Johns Hopkins university Full code on github How to use import "github.com/ahmednafies/go-covid/covid" covid . GetData ()
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Go Package to get information regarding the novel corona virus provided by Johns Hopkins university Full code on github
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Usage Get All Data data , err := covid . GetData () if err != nil { // Handle error here } fmt . Println ( data ) Get Status By Country Name data , err := covid . GetCountryByName ( "italy" ) if err != nil { // Handle error here } fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Id ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Country ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . LastUpdate ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Confirmed ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Deaths ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Active ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Recovered ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Latitude ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Longitude ) Result 113 Italy 1584216796000 21157 1441 17750 1966 41.8719 List Countries list , err := covid . ListCountries () if err != nil { // Handle error here } Result [ Attrs { Id : 40 Name : Hungary }, Attrs { Id : 113 Name : Italy } ... ] Get Status by Country ID data , err := covid . GetCountryById ( 113 ) Get Total Active Cases active , err := covid . GetTotalActive () Get Total Confirmed Cases confirmed , err := covid . GetTotalConfirmed () Get Total Recovered Cases recovered , err := covid . GetTotalRecovered () Get Total Deaths deaths , err := covid . GetTotalDeaths ()
docs.title: Examples

docs.text: data , err := covid . GetData () if err != nil { // Handle error here } fmt . Println ( data )
docs.title: Get All Data

docs.text: data , err := covid . GetCountryByName ( "italy" ) if err != nil { // Handle error here } fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Id ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Country ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . LastUpdate ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Confirmed ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Deaths ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Active ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Recovered ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Latitude ) fmt . Println ( data . Attrs . Longitude )
docs.title: Get Status By Country Name

docs.text: list , err := covid . ListCountries () if err != nil { // Handle error here }
docs.title: List Countries
